    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1928</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Paralympics swimmer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Paralympics Schwimmer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nageur de Paralympics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Swimmer de Paralympics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Swimmer di Paralympics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κολυμβητής Paralympics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Nadador de Paralympics</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online internet activity for English students, where the students read and learn about the paralympics gold medalist Brenda Levy,and answer questions about her/</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sports</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">paralympics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">disabilities</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Internet-Online-Dienst für englische 
Kursteilnehmer, in denen die Kursteilnehmer über die paralympics 
Goldmedaillenträger Brenda Steuer lesen und erlernen, und beantworten
Fragen über sie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité en ligne d'Internet pour les 
étudiants anglais, où les étudiants ont connaissance et apprennent 
du prélèvement de Brenda de médaillé d'or de paralympics, et 
répondent à des questions au sujet d'elle</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade em linha do Internet para os 
estudantes ingleses, onde os estudantes lêem e aprendem sobre o levy 
de Brenda do medalist do ouro do paralympics, e responde a perguntas 
sobre ela</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività in linea del Internet per gli 
allievi inglesi, in cui gli allievi leggono ed imparano 
sull'imposizione di Brenda del medalist dell'oro di paralympics e gli 
risponde le domande circa</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητα Διαδικτύου για 
τους αγγλικούς σπουδαστές, όπου οι σπουδαστές διαβάζουν και 
μαθαίνουν για τη χρυσή επιβολή Brenda κατόχων μεταλλίων 
paralympics, και τις ερωτήσεις απάντησης για την/</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad en línea del Internet para los 
estudiantes ingleses, donde los estudiantes leen y aprenden sobre la 
recaudación de Brenda del medallista del oro del paralympics, y 
contesta a preguntas sobre ella</string>
          </description>
